name: SIGNAL
description:
Game Summary: Signal is a third-person adventure game featuring nuclear post-apocalyptic, quantum entanglement and time travel. Filled with unknowns and dangers, the player takes on the role of a father searching for his daughter and explores the story of multiple worlds by traveling the path. Rise to the challenge of finding clues and unlocking puzzles for a chance to survive as you face extreme life and death decisions.

Style description: fight various monsters in a fantasy worldview with modern guns.

Gameplay: the game contains elements of collection, exploration, shooting, decryption, etc., in the open map to collect firearms and other resources to explore the mission points, and eliminate the monsters and other enemies on the way, in the communication with a variety of post-apocalyptic survivors continue to explore the truth.
